column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: Police were called to a birthday party at 11:20 pm on June 29
column7: Khan Chamkar Morn.------When authorities came to move the revelers on
column9: and a man who was intoxicated was arrested. He was taken to Chamkar Morn Police Department for further questioning.------The host of the birthday party accused authorities of using violence against them and took out a gun to threaten them.------The cops
column10: who intervened said the owner of the house pulled out a pistol. ------AREY------UPDATE: Later reports say the party-goers made a public apology the next morning.
